resultSearch.chipsGTSupprimees: Include lots withe deleted technical guarantees
resultSearch.chipsGTSupprimeesTooltip: This option can only be used if an insurer code and/or a technical guarantee code is entered. In this case, the search result includes lots containing the searched guarantee even if it has been deleted from the lot.
